keyMoments.title: Ace Invites Straw Hats to Join Whitebeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: Ace suggests that the Straw Hat Pirates join the Whitebeard Pirates, but Luffy refuses, stating he wants to compete for the Pirate King title himself.
keyMoments.significance: First direct mention and introduction of the Whitebeard Pirates as a major pirate organization in the series.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Revealed as Traitor
keyMoments.description: Ace reveals that Blackbeard was a member of the Whitebeard Pirates who killed his crewmate Thatch and fled, which is why Ace is hunting him.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes critical backstory about the Whitebeard Pirates' internal conflict that will lead to major future events.

statusHistory.reason: One of the most powerful pirate crews in the world

reveals.information: First introduction of the Whitebeard Pirates as a major crew, with Ace as 2nd Division Commander
Blackbeard was a member who killed Thatch and fled, now being hunted by Ace

keyMoments.title: Billions Execute Mr. 11
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works Billions members kill Mr. 11 to prevent him from revealing organizational secrets to the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Baroque Works' ruthless approach to maintaining secrecy and internal security.

keyMoments.title: Billions Attack Fire Fist Ace
keyMoments.description: Mr. Mellow, Geronimo, and other Billions agents attempt to capture Ace, hoping to earn promotion to Officer Agents.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ambition and hierarchical structure within Baroque Works, where Billions compete for advancement.

keyMoments.title: Five Billions Ships Destroyed
keyMoments.description: Ace destroys five Billions ships with a single Hiken attack, demonstrating the vast power gap between the lower-ranked agents and truly powerful pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Illustrates why the Billions are considered low-ranking agents and how outmatched they are against top-tier pirates.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as secret criminal organization in Arabasta

reveals.information: Billions are low-ranking agents who can be promoted to Officer Agents by capturing high-value targets
Baroque Works eliminates captured members to prevent information leaks

keyMoments.title: Escape to Going Merry
keyMoments.description: The crew successfully escapes from Smoker and reaches their ship, but realizes Luffy is missing.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's concern for their captain and their bond.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Refuses to Join Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: When Ace suggests they join the Whitebeard Pirates, Luffy refuses, maintaining his independence and dream.
keyMoments.significance: Reaffirms the crew's commitment to Luffy's dream of becoming Pirate King independently.

keyMoments.title: Celebration with Ace
keyMoments.description: The crew enjoys time with Ace aboard the Going Merry, bonding and celebrating.
keyMoments.significance: One of the few moments of peace and celebration during the intense Arabasta Arc.
